Join PEP as a Part-Time Sales Assistant - a culture of growth and development, with the opportunity to work up to 27 hours a week. At PEP, we're known as Dynamos - we work hard, have fun, and take pride in everything we do. As a Dynamo, you'll be dynamic, helpful, and committed to ensuring our customers look and feel great.


Purpose of Position:

As a friendly team player, your role involves promoting sales, minimising stock losses, managing inventory, assisting customers, operating the cash register, and upholding a low-cost culture to achieve business objectives. At PEP, we nurture a culture that encourages our team members to grow from within, offering chances for professional development and advancement within the company. This helps our team thrive and realise their full potential.


If this sounds like you and you want to be part of the PEP family, apply through the JOBJACK platform, where we find our new team members. It's really important that you're honest and trustworthy, especially when it comes to handling money.


*The position requires honesty in dealing with cash or finance.

Hire Resolve is delighted to present an opportunity for a dedicated Quality Assurance Manager specializing in food safety and quality assurance in the food manufacturing industry. Key Responsibilities: Ensure compliance with food safety regulations and industry standards, including HACCP, ISO 22000, and FSSC 22000. Develop, implement, and maintain quality assurance programs to monitor compliance with specifications and quality standards. Lead all quality audits and assist in the coordination of external audits. Troubleshoot any quality-related issues, while providing technical guidance to production teams. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvement initiatives. Conduct training programs for staff on quality control procedures, safety practices, and hygiene standards. Analyze quality metrics to identify trends and implement corrective action as needed. Develop and maintain SOPs, work instructions, and training manuals related to quality assurance. Manage supplier assurance and conduct regular supplier audits to ensure compliance with quality expectations. Create reports on quality performance and communicate findings to upper management. Requirements Minimum 5 years of experience as Food Safety & Quality Manager in FMCG Previous experience in a food production environment Experience in QA systems monitoring and evaluation Strong computer literacy, particularly in Excel and email Familiarity with ERP systems is a plus Oversight of day-to-day compliance and food safety Leadership of a Food Safety and Quality team and meetings Quality control analysis experience Conducting internal audits and SOP documentation Benefits Contact Hire Resolve for your next career-changing move. Salary: negotiable. Our client is offering a highly competitive salary for this role based on experience. Apply for this role today, contact Min Roux at Hire Resolve or on LinkedIn You can also visit the Hire Resolve website: hireresolve.us or email us your CV: manufacturinghireresolve.za.com We will contact you telephonically in 3 days should you be suitable for this vacancy.
